CodeEditorModel.Text:
' Boolean Array definition: ' PanelStatus_ActualBatchIN(0) => False = Not Busy, True = Busy (moving) ' PanelStatus_ActualBatchIN(1) => False = Not done, True = Movement done
'PanelStatus_ActualBatchIN Bool(1) : Status for the IN movement 'PanelStatus_ActualBatchOUT Bool(1) : Status for the OUT movement 'PanelStatus_ActualBatchINOUT Bool : False = Panel outside (hidden), True = Panel Inside (showing)
Sub movePanelBatchEditor If (Not PanelStatus_BatchEditorIN(0) ) And ( Not PanelStatus_BatchEditorOUT(0) ) 'If the panel is not moving IN / OUT
PanelStatus_BatchEditorINOUT = Not PanelStatus_BatchEditorINOUT
If PanelStatus_BatchEditorINOUT animation.StartMoveAnimation(Group5, 0, -430, 450, False, PanelStatus_BatchEditorIN) Else animation.StartMoveAnimation(Group5, 0, 430, 450, False, PanelStatus_BatchEditorIN) End If
End If
End Sub
